Package entities

Class Enquiry

java.lang.Object
entities.Enquiry
public class Enquiry extends Object
Represents an Enquiry Object A Enquiry has the base attributres of a campId, enquiryBody seen (whether the enquiry has been seen, if seen, cannot be edited), creationDate and lastUpdatedDate Each enquiry has a unique enquiryId which is an auto-incremented static attribute
Since:
2021-11-12
Version:
1.0
Author:
Teo Xuan Ming

  • Constructor Details

    • Enquiry

      public Enquiry(String enquiryBody, boolean seen, LocalDate creationDate)
      Constructor for Enquiry
      Parameters:
      enquiryBody - the body of the enquiry
      seen - whether the enquiry has been seen
      creationDate - the date that the enquiry was created

    • Enquiry

      public Enquiry(int enquiryId, String enquiryBody, boolean seen, LocalDate creationDate, LocalDate lastUpdateDate, ArrayList<String> replies)
      Constructor for Enquiry when reading from the enquiry.csv Overloaded to include lastUpdateDate and replies
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - the enquiryId to be assigned to the new enquiry
      enquiryBody - the body of the enquiry
      seen - whether the enquiry has been seen
      creationDate - the date that the enquiry was created
      lastUpdateDate - the date that the enquiry was last updated
      replies - the list of replies to the enquiry

  • Method Details

    • setNextEnquiryId

      public static void setNextEnquiryId(int nextEnquiryId)
      When reading from the enquiries.csv, the enquiryId is already included get the next enquiryId from the csv file this ensures that the next enquiryId is always greater than the previous and previous enquiryId will not be overwritten
      Parameters:
      nextEnquiryId - the next enquiryId to be assigned to a new enquiry
